description: The Shortbread vector tile schema is intended to be a basic, lean, general-purpose vector tile schema for OpenStreetMap data. It does not, and is not intended to, cover the full breadth and depth of OpenStreetMap tagging.
name: OpenStreetMap Shortbread

vector_layers.description: This layer contains oceans.
This layer contains inland water bodies and glaciers.

fields.way_area: Area of the feature in square meters, in the Web Mercator projection

vector_layers.description: Holds point geometries and names for all named water polygons available in the water_polygons layer.

fields.name: Value of OSM name tag
fields.way_area: Area of the feature in square meters, in the Web Mercator projection

vector_layers.description: Holds waterway line geometries

fields.tunnel: true for tunnel=yes/building_passage or covered=yes, false otherwise

vector_layers.description: Hold line geometries and names for named water lines
Holds line geometries of dams (not dykes)
Holds polygon geometries of dams (not dykes).
This layer contains piers, breakwaters and groynes mapped as lines. See the pier_polygons layer for those mapped as polygons
This layer contains piers, breakwaters and groynes mapped as polygons. See the pier_lines layer for those mapped as lines.
Holds boundary lines of countries and states.

fields.admin_level: highest administrative boundary this line belongs to
fields.disputed: Boundary line is tagged as disputed
fields.maritime: Boundary line is located on sea

vector_layers.description: Holds label points for boundary polygons of countries and states.

fields.name: Value of OSM name tag
fields.way_area: Area of the feature in square meters, in the Web Mercator projection

vector_layers.description: Holds label points for populated places.
This layer contains basic land cover that is usually drawn first.
This layer is for types of land use that will usually be above the basic land layer, but below buildings.
Has polygons for every building
Has points for everything with an address. If a feature is available in the pois layer, it will not be duplicated in the addresses layer.
Holds line geometries of the whole road network

fields.kind: Feature class, contains value of highway=*, aeroway=* or railway=*
fields.oneway: true for oneway=yes/1/true/-1; always false for rail features
fields.oneway_reverse: true for reverse (not reversible) oneways (oneway=-1); always false for rail features
fields.tunnel: true for tunnel=yes/building_passage or covered=yes, false otherwise

vector_layers.description: Holds polygons geometries of certain streets mapped as polygons

fields.kind: Feature class, contains value of highway=* or area:aeroway=*
fields.tunnel: true for tunnel=yes/building_passage or covered=yes, false otherwise

vector_layers.description: This layer holds street geometries for labelling. It contains their names and reference numbers

fields.kind: value of OSM highway=*, aeroway=* or taxiway=* tag
fields.name: Value of OSM name tag
fields.ref: value of OSM ref=* tag, semicolons replaced by newline characters
fields.ref_cols: maximum line length of the ref field
fields.ref_rows: number of lines of the ref field

vector_layers.description: Holds labelling points of the polygons of the streets_polygons layer

fields.kind: value of OSM highway=*, aeroway=* or taxiway=* tag
fields.name: Value of OSM name tag

vector_layers.description: This layer holds motorway exit labels

fields.kind: value of OSM highway=* or aeroway=* tag
fields.name: Value of OSM name tag

vector_layers.description: This layer contains bridges mapped as polygons. There is no distinction which type of road, railway, runway or waterway uses this bridge.
Holds aerialways as lines.
Holds line geometries of ferries.
Holds public transport stops as points. Areas in OSM are represented by a point.
Holds public transport stops as points. Areas in OSM are represented by a point.
